metadata.title: CVE-2016-6347 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the default exception handlerin RESTEasy allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy-java - 3.6.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: resteasy package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-2').
